```{r echo=FALSE}
setwd(getwd())

library(readxl)
loss <- read_excel("./ex11-53cheese.xls")

taste = c()
acetic = c()
h2s = c()
lactic = c()

for (n in 1:nrow(loss)) {
  taste <- append(taste, as.numeric(loss[n,1]))
  acetic <- append(acetic, as.numeric(loss[n,2]))
  h2s <- append(h2s, as.numeric(loss[n,3]))
  lactic <- append(lactic, as.numeric(loss[n,4]))
}


```
